input.sentences: boom ! boom ! boom ! the wonders of a fireworks display .
the designs an colors of fireworks are mesmerizing .
the finale is always the best part of a fireworks display .
output.sentences: A fireworks display started, creating wonders in the night sky.
Very interesting, even mesmerizing, designs were noted as the fireworks exploded.
One display resembled a large collection of crystals.
Other fireworks gave the appearnace of pom-poms in the sky.
The fireworks finale had an intriguing display within a display.
